## Data sets created

```{r}
data.cancer <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\10409\\Desktop\\Group 37\\group_37.csv")
n <- nrow(data.cancer)
ind1 <- sample(c(1:n),floor(0.5*n))
ind2 <- sample(c(1:n)[-ind1],floor(0.25*n))
ind3 <- setdiff(c(1:n),c(ind1,ind2))
train.data <- data.cancer[ind1,]
valid.data <- data.cancer[ind2,]
test.data <- data.cancer[ind3,]
```

五折分类

## Dimension reduction

```{r}
#use PCA
my.pca <- prcomp(train.data,center = T)
summary(my.pca)
plot(my.pca)
my.pca$loadings
```
